title:
An optimal method for high order mixed derivatives of bivariate
  functions
abstract:
The problem of optimal recovering high-order mixed derivatives of bivariate
functions with finite smoothness is studied. Based on the truncation method, an
algorithm for numerical differentiation is constructed, which is order-optimal
both in the sense of accuracy and in terms of the amount of involved Galerkin
information. Numerical examples are provided to illustrate the fact that our
approach can be implemented successfully.
